question: After choosing a model, Priya at CloudNexus wants to ensure it continues effectively serving her business needs. What is an important step in this ongoing process?
options: Skip performance monitoring unless issues arise
Avoid switching models to reduce complexity
Continuously test and update the model as needed
correct_answer: Continuously test and update the model as needed
explanation: Regular testing and updates ensure the model remains effective and adapts to any changes in data or business requirements.
